Game information: 

Welcome to the Call of Duty: Ghosts, a new page of the famous 
game series of all time. For the first time in the history of the series, 
players will take part in the battle on the side of the weaker side, and 
will not fight for freedom and rights, and for the sake of survival. Ten 
years after the devastating event, the boundaries of the United States 
and the global balance of power changed. In this harsh reality, the officers 
of an elite unit "Ghosts" to challenge the new global force, equipped with 
the latest technology and applying for world domination. New universe Call 
of Duty: For the first time the series, players will take part in the battle 
on the side of the weaker side, when the enemy is superior, not only by the 
number of trunks, but also on the technological equipment. Players will be 
introduced to new characters and brand new to the Call of Dutu location.

Game Features

Drawing a new generation advanced technology, uniting incredibly realistic characters, 
stunning locations, advanced lighting, and special effects worthy of the best Hollywood 
blockbuster.

Unique experience: for the first time in the history of the series, players will take part in the battle on the side of the weaker side, when the enemy is superior, not only by the number of trunks, but also on the technological equipment.

The development of a multi-user game: With the updated engine Call of Duty: Ghosts will change your ideas about modes of multiplayer games. The dynamically changing maps you will encounter earthquakes, floods, and other events that could affect the strongest terms the tactics and strategy of the fight. And the advanced character editor allows players to create a truly unique fighters.
